name: The Cinema of Mamoru Oshii: Fantasy, Technology and Politics
summary: Japanese animation has been particularly successful in the US, and among the most celebrated Japanese animation artists is director Mamoru Oshii. This book is an analytical survey of Oshii's cinematic works from the early years of his career through his 21st-century productions, including 'Beautiful Dreamer'.
